subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari, the Knicks’ first-round pick, received a cortisone shot in his sore back Thursday afternoon and is being prescribed extended rest as he tries to recover from a bulging disc.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari, the Knicks’ first-round pick, received a cortisone shot in his sore back Thursday afternoon and is being prescribed extended rest as he tries to recover from a bulging disc.
